import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Layaout from '../components/Layaout/layaout' import Footer from '../components/Layaout/footer'; import firebase from '../firebase'; //validaciones import useValidacion from '../hooks/useValidacion' import validarCrearCuenta from '../validacion/validarCrearCuenta' // State Inicial const STATE_INICIAL = { email: '', password: '' } const Login = () => { const {valores, errores, handleChange, handleSubmit,} = useValidacion(STATE_INICIAL, validarCrearCuenta, crearCuenta) const {email, password} = valores; return (

) } export default Login
